arts.ttl: Bristol City 2 - 1 Watford recap: Wells and McCrorie secure all three points for Reds in BS3 - Bristol Live
arts.sum: The now sixth-placed Robins took advantage of the fact that two fellow top-six hopefuls, West Brom and Coventry, tasted defeat in the earlier window of games and moved into the play-off positions ahead of their high-stakes game with the Baggies at Ashton Gate on Tuesday, April 8. Ross McCrorie put Liam Manning’s side ahead after 23 minutes following Max Bird’s dispossession of Hornets’ defender James Abankwah in the final third.

arts.ttl: Losing Baah so early tore the Watford game-plan to shreds
arts.sum: The forward had looked a real threat in the first 15 minutes but his premature exit set the Hornets on the slippery slope at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Watford as win fires Reds into top six
arts.sum: Liam Manning said earlier in the week that Rob Dickie is back to his best in Bristol City colours and that was clear to see against Watford. If there were a moment that summed up what Jason Knight brings to this squad, it came at 0-0 when the Bristol City skipper ran half the length of the pitch all to steal the ball off of Edo Kayembe just as he shaped to shoot.
How the game at Ashton Gate unfolded as Watford are beaten despite Mamadou Doumbia's first goal for the club.

arts.ttl: Ross McCrorie and Nahki Wells fire Bristol City past Watford and into top six
arts.sum: Liam Manning’s team claimed three deserved points.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Watford as McCrorie pushes for start
arts.sum: While Liam Manning would likely tell you each and every game in the Championship is important, this afternoon's clash with Watford feels like it could well prove to be crucial in the story of Bristol City's season. As we mentioned in last week's predicted team, trying to work out what Liam Manning might do in the middle park is an awful lot more difficult than guessing how Bristol City will start in defence currently.

arts.ttl: 'We're not stupid' - Liam Manning makes honest Bristol City confession ahead of Watford clash
arts.sum: Liam Manning has confessed that Bristol City know their next two games against Watford and West Brom will be important in the Reds' play-off push this term, insisting he, his coaching staff and players are "not stupid." On paper, City's run-in until the end of the season is more challenging than that ahead of the teams in and around them in the Championship table with games against the likes of Sunderland and Leeds United still to come as well as this week's matches against Watford and the Baggies.

arts.ttl: Liam Manning sets Rob Dickie challenge for Bristol City run-in after return to 'excellent' level
arts.sum: Liam Manning has challenged Rob Dickie to maintain his "excellent" level for the remainder of the season after admitting the Bristol City vice-captain suffered a slight "drop off" following his injury earlier this season. Liam Manning sets Rob Dickie challenge for Bristol City run-in after return to 'excellent' level

arts.ttl: Tom Cleverley shares Liam Manning and Bristol City verdict ahead of Watford's Ashton Gate visit
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley has labelled Bristol City boss Liam Manning a "very good coach" ahead of Watford's trip to Ashton Gate this weekend, admitting his side's clash with the Robins will be "very significant" in both team's season. Although a win wouldn't be enough to see Watford climb back into the play-off places this weekend, a defeat at Ashton Gate would stretch the gap to the Reds to seven points and, in turn, massively dent the Hornets' promotion hopes .

arts.ttl: Liam Manning makes Elijah Morrison admission after recent Bristol City Under-21s absences
arts.sum: Liam Manning admits Bristol City "need" Elijah Morrison in their first-team squad currently, insisting he has "no doubts" the young defender will feature whilst discussing his absence from Under-21s fixtures in recent weeks. The left-back has missed the Young Robins' last seven matches, including Tuesday afternoon's 4-2 win over Hull City, instead tending to travel and train with Manning's first team.
